entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
